name: Kalmécak
description:
*CURRENTLY THIS GAME IS IN SPANISH ONLY*

You are an average and unremarkable student among the most remarkable of people there in Tenochtitlan. You study at a college named Kalmekak, so prestigious and exclusive that the only students they  accept are the ones with noble lineage, the roumour has it that you can find gods too! Currently, an important festivity is going on, and everyone at your school are burning themselves out in order to make sure that everything will go just as planned. 

Make decisions in order to shape your own route through the story, and enjoy the interactions with the characters you may encounter along the way.  Will you make room for love with a mysterious girl? Will you devote your attention to your studies? Or you may go in an adventure with the school jock?

That's up to you to choose in this visual novel plagued with references about the aztec's culture!

- Brought to you by: 5 freshmen who don't know what the heck they're doing.
